mapper.select: SELECT D.DONG_NO FROM TB_DONG D JOIN TB_SIGUNGU S ON D.SIGUNGU_NO = S.SIGUNGU_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S.SIGUNGU_NAME = #{sigunguName} AND D.DONG_NAME = #{dongName}

SELECT C.CONTENT_ID AS contentId , C.CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode , C.TITLE AS title , C.FIRST_IMAGE AS firstImage , C.CREATED_TIME AS createdTime , C.MODIFIED_TIME AS modifiedTime , C.TEL AS tel , C.CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode , C.STATUS AS status , T.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName , SIDO.SIDO_NO AS sidoNo , SIDO.SIDO_NAME AS sidoName , TS.SIGUNGU_NAME AS sigunguName , A.POST_ADDRESS AS postAddress , I.FILE_URL AS FILE_URL FROM TB_CONTENT C LEFT JOIN TB_CATEGORY T ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = T.CATEGORY_CODE ) LEFT JOIN TB_DETAIL_ADD A ON (C.CONTENT_ID = A.CONTENT_ID ) LEFT JOIN TB_DONG TD ON (TD.DONG_NO = A.DONG_NO ) LEFT JOIN TB_SIGUNGU TS ON (TS.SIGUNGU_NO = TD.SIGUNGU_NO ) LEFT JOIN TB_SIDO SIDO ON (TS.SIDO_NO = SIDO.SIDO_NO ) LEFT JOIN TB_CONTENT_IMG I ON (C.CONTENT_ID = I.CONTENT_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND C.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}

SELECT PROGRAM AS program, EVENT_EXP AS eventExp, SPONSOR AS sponsor, USETIME_FESTIVAL AS useTimeFestival, EVENT_START_DATE AS eventStartDate, EVENT_END_DATE AS eventEndDate FROM TB_FESTIVAL WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT FOOD_EXP AS foodExp, MAIN_MENU AS mainMenu, PARKING AS parking FROM TB_FOOD WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT LODGING_EXP AS lodgingExp, CHECK_IN AS checkIn, CHECK_OUT AS checkOut, PARKING AS parking, ELEVATOR AS elevator FROM TB_LODGING WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT TOUR_EXP AS tourExp, USETIME_TOUR AS useTimeTour, PARKING AS parking FROM TB_TOUR WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
